Reviews.Content: Not happy with service Not impressed with the customer service at all. By complimentary breakfast they mean pastries, not breakfast. Would never recommend this hotel to anyone.
Reviews.Author: Jackson29

Reviews.Content: OK for budget travellers....otherwise give it a miss! Stayed here for 3 days with my wife in March and its fine for budget travellers although even then I'd look around as its not particularly cheap! Good things about this hotel are its location, 5-10 mins walk to Fisherman's Wharf, Lombard Street right around the corner and its on busy street which is well served by the local buses. The rooms are dated but clean. Bad things, it doesn't look particularly nice. Being a motel its on a busy street so you can hear a lot of noise from the street especially when trucks come through or people playing loud music! Walls are paper thin which meant 1 night we had to listen to the 3 girls next door dissecting their club night at 3am...we could hear their whole conversation clearly. They say breakfast is included but its a joke, a some coffee and stale croissants if you fancy it! All in all fine if you are single travellers on a budget and other budget hotels are not available. Personally we won't be back, Cathedral Hotel down the road costs a bit more but much nicer and seeing as we got a bus pass its easy to get around so there's not so much benefit being so close if you have to stay in a place like this!
Reviews.Author: dripsy
